segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust looking at the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just going to make the floor all wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how the woman is just standing there, not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're just as bad, trying to sneak cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how the boy is standing on that wobbly stool, not caring about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel disgusted by how much is going wrong in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how the water is just going to waste, overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how no one is paying attention to what's really happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just filled with little things that make me feel disgusted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't even look at it anymore, it's making me feel sick.
segments.speaker: PAR
